gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentResults` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_InvestmentResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_InvestmentResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentResultsCategoriesBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentResultsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
